titles.title: Recognizing and commemorating the contributions of contemporary Latinas in the State of Illinois.
Recognizing and commemorating the contributions of contemporary Latinas in the State of Illinois.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Accountability.

bill.summary:
This resolution celebrates the impact and contributions of contemporary Latinas in Illinois.
The resolution also recognizes (1) the importance of accurate and timely data on Latinas living in the United States, and (2) the U.S. Census Bureau's role in delivering data that impacts the political and economic power and influence of Latinas.
